result.name: broads-authority-site-specific-lines
result.notes:
This is a Line dataset depicting Policies that do not relate to specific settlements, but cover wide areas or a range of smaller sites across the Broads. Specifically XNS 4 (Main Roads Network) and XNS 7 (Haddiscoe to Beccles Former Railway) adopted by the Broads Authority on 11/07/14. It should be used in conjunction with the Site Specific Point and Polygon datasets and the Adopted Broads Sites Specifics Local Plan. 

The definitive maps including constraints (correct as at 19/02/14) are available to view as PDF documents on the Broads Authority website. The Broads Authority does not accept any liability or responsibility for decisions, and matters arising from decisions, made based upon the provided data.

This data is licensed for use non commercial personal use under the OS INSPIRE End User Licence. By viewing or downloading this data you are agreeing to the terms of this licence. If this does not meet your requirement please contact the Broads Authority using the details below.

organization.name: broads-authority
organization.title: Broads Authority
organization.description:
The Broads Authority is a statutory body with duty to manage the Broads for the purposes of:

(a) conserving and enhancing the natural beauty, wildlife and cultural heritage of the Broads;
(b) promoting opportunities for the understanding and enjoyment of the special qualities of the Broads by the public; and
(c) protecting the interests of navigation.

result.title: Broads Authority Site Specific Lines
